name: The Psychoduck
description:
The Psychoduck is a stealth game about a psychotic duck who collects crowns and has no problem killing all herons in order to increase his collection.
Distract enemies with your slingshot, surf alligators, help turtles make way and more!

  • Be stealthy.


  • 50 handcrafted levels!


  • Several characters to help you on the journey!


  • Distract enemies with scenery!


  • Play on 3 different biomes!


  • Collect all hidden snails.


  • And kill all the herons!
